<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_ng1b19PK1w1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/FofeaKtKQ48" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>HCJustin of Buffalo Wizards fame, has started playing Kerbal Space Program. In the start of his new series, watch him open the game for the first time ever and gradually figure things out on his own. It’s a brand new frontier for him and we all get to experience it it together!</p>

First dead Kerbal for him...

Me thinks he did not know anything about rockets in real life in the first place...

Cause a kapsule without engines please...
